/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and illuminating the scene with a network of light. Cars and pedestrians animate the street, contributing to the dynamic energy of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a serene contrast to the bustling activity below. In the distance, trees can be seen, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
